wikipedia_page.main: Allan Grant (born 1 July 1973) is a Scottish former professional footballer.

response: Allan Grant (October 23, 1919 – February 1, 2008) was an American photojournalist for Life magazine. He had the last photo shoot with actress Marilyn Monroe and took the first photos of Marina Oswald, Lee Harvey Oswald's wife, following U.S. President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
* Allan Grant materials in the South Asian American Digital Archive (SAADA)
* Thurber, Jon. (February 9, 2008). Allan Grant, 88; shot iconic photos for Life magazine. The Los Angeles Times
